title: Get Lucky
tagline: Stash our fortune tellers with tips on using condoms.

reportbackInfo.confirmationMessage: Score! Thanks for telling people what's up with condoms.
reportbackInfo.copy: Show us how you stashed these fortune tellers with ninja-like stealthiness!

facts.problem: There are a surprising number of ways to improperly use a condom. Seems easy, but people mess it up all the time.
